00028 VPGraphicObj::VPGraphicObj() {
00029     show = true;
00030 }
00031 
00032 void VPGraphicObj::Show() {
00033     show = true;
00034 }
00035 
00036 void VPGraphicObj::Hide() {
00037     show = false;
00038 }
00039 
00040 void VPGraphicObj::ToggleVisibility() {
00041     show = !show;
00042 }
00043 
00044 bool VPGraphicObj::IsVisible() {
00045     return show;
00046 }

00048 void VPGraphicObj::ComputeRecursiveBoundingBox() {
00049     list<const VPSceneNode*>::const_iterator iter;
00050     const VPGraphicObj* objPtr;
00051 
00052     recBBox = bBox;
00053     for (iter = childList.begin(); iter != childList.end(); ++iter)
00054     {
00055         objPtr = dynamic_cast<const VPGraphicObj*>(*iter);
00056         if (objPtr) // objPtr != NULL
00057             recBBox.MergeWith(objPtr->GetRecursiveBoundingBox());
00058     }
00059 }
